name: Dirt Bike Apocalypse
description:
It’s the apocalypse and zombies are everywhere!
With your armed dirt bike you have to shoot and kill the zombies in order to get extra time and reach the end of the level to get to the next one.
Beware that the bigger zombies are harder to kill!
You have 3 weapons at your disposal that you can pick up during the way which are shotgun,machine gun and RPG.
You can select the preferred type of controls in the options menu as long as other features.
Good luck!
